column3:
ヴォーイは家庭料理に飢えている… っと

豪華で手の込んだものを作れるよりも
残り物でパパッと作れる方が好感度UP… っと
なるほど なるほど～
しっかりメモしておかないとな…
column4:
People really crave home cooking... Huh.


Rather than designing an elaborate meal,
it's sometimes better to make something
quick using a few homemade ingredients.
Huh... I should really write that down...

column3:
寝てません！考えていただけです！

…って なんだ…
脅かすんじゃないよ…
先生かと思ったじゃないか…
column4:
I wasn't sleeping! I was just thinking!


Wait, what? I thought you were the
teacher! Don't scare me like that!

column3:
昼間は恋のABC夜はお料理のABC…
寝る間も惜しんで恋の特訓中で疲れてるんだ…
悪いけど何か用事なら
他の人を あたってくれないか
column4:
The relationship class in the afternoon
and the cooking class at night... And
then all the studying, too...
I'm so tired... Please, could you talk with
someone else?

column3:
寝てはない…
私は寝てなどないぞ！
私は ステキなヴォーイを見つけて
ナイスな一軒家に住んで
キュートなヴェーヴィを授かり
ハッピーな老後を過ごすのが夢なんだ！
夢をかなえるための大切なレッスンだ
寝るわけがないだろう！
column4:
I wasn't sleeping...
Really, I swear I wasn't sleeping!

I've always dreamed of going out into
the wide world, living a life of adventure,
and then settling down with my true love.
We'd have a wonderful little vehvi and
live happily ever after. I'm sure of it.

But these lessons are critical if I want to
pull all of that off, so I can't afford to
sleep through them!
